title.label: Great but boring after a while

content.label: Wanted to play this cause I heard it‚Äôs basically Chrono trigger. I really just wanted to clear the story but the main story becomes overly difficult at each step forcing you to do side quests and grind in AD‚Äôs tediously to meet the required level. I had a team of all 5* members and I‚Äôd still find myself effortlessly grinding away repeatedly doing the same dungeon over and over again and spending scrolls left and right in order to level. Eventually I just got bored of it and deleted the game ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è I know it‚Äôs a free game so can‚Äôt really complain, just wish the battle system wasn‚Äôt so repetitive I guess. Or story was easier to clear.
The last update, now it crashes when I hit ‚Äúcontinue.‚Äú This update did not fix that issue, it still crashes upon tapping ‚Äúcontinue.‚Äù

I‚Äôm a 37 year old millennial whose only real RPG experience was Dragon Warrior on NES, but I LOVED that game.  I‚Äôve looked for games here and there that had that same feel but with the newer capabilities of today‚Äôs technology and never found anything that clicked for me, until now..

I‚Äôm only an hour in to Eden and I love it already!  The music and aesthetics are awesome!  I like the turn based battles and there seems to be plenty of options available to make the game a little more complex as you get further in to the game.

I‚Äôm giving it a pre-emptive 5/5 based on what I‚Äôve seen so far.. I‚Äôm pretty shocked by how good this is for a mobile game.  I think it holds its own no matter the console, imo.

It‚Äôll be nice to have some relief from all the insanity in the world today!  I look forward to continuing the game!  Cheers!!
honestly one of the funnest games i‚Äôve ever played some parts are confused when you start but the game is really easy to pick up once you understand
Seemed like a good game. However whenever I open the menu it randomly crashes making it unplayable so I never really got a a chance to find out.

Don‚Äôt buy the stones. One they cost way too much for a small chance at a 5 star and the probability of getting a new char is too low. They just had the higher probability for all the new char for 1000 paid stones and I didn‚Äôt get any of them. I ended up with an old chat that was already a 5 star. Complete waste and you can‚Äôt get money back after that. Do not invest in this game.

content.label: When I tried to boot up the game, it suddenly  closes the app after one second of the app. What can I do to stop this?
Enough said

I LOVE THIS GAME, but I can‚Äôt get passed the loading screen, it won‚Äôt load, and I don‚Äôt wanna lost my progress, help please!

I really wanted to like this game. It looks great, has some cool crossovers, but man I‚Äôm a few hours in and I think I‚Äôve actually ‚Äúplayed‚Äù the game for less than 10 minutes. It‚Äôs all just run, unskippable dialogue, run somewhere else, unstoppable dialogue. I didn‚Äôt find the story to be particularly interesting and I wanted to do some combat, but it‚Äôs all just dialogue.
I can‚Äôt believe this game is free.  Great story and really fun and enjoyable.  Great work on this game!
Good game.

This game is amazing with great story line, for those who is playing and having hard time DONT give up yet! You have to grind to higher level to beat certain bosses and the story will get better. This is a good grind game too if u can‚Äôt pull and 5 star characters you can still upgrade certain 4 star to five star character, some of the characters that u upgrade to 5 star are top tier characters in the game

I love the overall idea of the game. The graphics are beautiful and the it‚Äôs really fun to play. All of the characters have really good personalities and designs. Just one thing, though. Sometimes, the game will suddenly freeze for no reason. It gets really annoying and I often have to close the game, causing me to have to redo certain scenes. But overall, it‚Äôs really great!!!

I used to really enjoy this game but I am starting to get very frustrated and disillusioned. On several occasions I‚Äôve spent hard earned gems to get new characters but pull only garbage 3-stars and repeat 4-stars. I‚Äôve even purchased gems with real cash and still don‚Äôt get anyone worthwhile. It gets really boring repeating the same encounters to maximize character‚Äôs level only to be defeated by opponents beyond that. You need to ease up on the game and allow players to achieve quests and progress. Some challenges are expected but not a 100 foot brick wall!
My favorite game in a long time!! Everything I love it‚Äôs there

Captures the feel of classic RPGs.  Excellent story and lore.  Many games today rely on limited-time exclusives that are high-value and almost required to succeed.  While AE does have gacha recruiting and there are high-value characters, the game‚Äôs content is all permanent, making it exceedingly casual-friendly.  This is a policy I wish more mobile games took.  Incredible work, cannot recommend more highly.

title.label: Had high hopes for Kato and mitsuda

content.label: Dialogue can be tedious. Unclear how extra g√¢cha characters fit in. Tedious quests. Combat is fun, no regular healing items means having to re run dungeons multiple times. Music is great so far. Leaving this review after the volcano boss, which another reviewer quit at. One of my characters died once so far, but I was being lazy, haven‚Äôt felt difficulty I read about in other reviews yet. Not sure if I will finish, feel that certain design choices do not respect my time

title.label: Needs new update better more stronger weapons

content.label: Love this game but poor weapon skills and equipments never changed not often.Not many to choose from.I've been trying upgrade and raise my skills higher to be stronger and weapons too are very weak at all times!Same old weapons similar back and forth.Never gets better and stronger.Couldn't beat the boss. Hoping someone like a created developer who invented the game reads this.Needs help.
This game it self is a 5 star, but the cut scene are too slow and it wont let you skip it. Like seriously, which game has side quests that has 5min plus of cut scene.

Have been playing for 3 weeks now. Worth the play. 

1. Gachas are usually stingy. This one is fair. Many pulls can get you a unit that can reach max evolution. 
2. Familiar with the chrono series. The composer Yasunori Mitsuda is the composer. 
3. Great story. Many side episodes to create new content. 

Minor suggestion to improve unit management. Equip, evolve, etc.
From the plot to the character designs to music, everything is perfect! Although technically a gacha game, you rarely even need to use the gacha feature. Love this game so much!

I never thought a mobile game could capture everything I loved about the RPGs from my youth but here we are. Another Eden is becoming one of my ALL TIME favorite games. Great job on every single aspect.

I love this game, so hooked in the side quests and just grinding in general for materials. The fact that I still have so much more to go for the main story and it‚Äôs still gets recently updated is amazing. Definitely have recommended and will continue to recommend playing this amazing game
Very fun game so far!!
This is a very fun and classic feel jrpg that you can take your time and enjoy all that it has to offer

title.label: Why the update file has to be so huge?!

content.label: I enjoyed every aspect of the game so far but with only one complaint, the update sizes are ginormous! Whenever there‚Äôs an update, it‚Äôs like I have to re-download the entire game, or even worse. Somehow the updating connection is extremely vulnerable and the process can easily get interrupted and canceled. I have other games that have update sizes ranging in couple Gbs but none has this sort of issue. Very frustrating to update, please fix it.

Same gist as the other reviews; this game is great for a truckload of reasons.

Pros:
- No stamina system to limit gameplay time
- Beautiful character art that isn't grossly sexualized
- Eye-pleasing world design, too
- Story that's actually fun to follow
- Characters don't only look nice, but also sound nice. Can't expect amazing character development for a gacha game, but the character quests are thought out and cute.
- Lots of content
- Gacha rates aren't as terrible as other games
- Gameplay is not so dependent on specific gacha characters like some other games
- Not a paying player, but I'm considering spending money for this game because it does have some nice gacha benefits for paid currency
- Open world exploring
- Translated well
- Fishing and mining mini-games (that are grind-y but distract-y)

Cons:
- Requires a bit of grinding.
- No friend system or such. I don't care for multiplayer (I play mobile games to be alone, not to socialize), but it would be nice to connect with other players. It is based on a traditional JRPG system, though, so I'm not gonna complain.
- Too addictive. So addictive. Give me back my sleeptime.

Personal Con:
It's the same in pretty much any other action-based gacha game, but I still wish there were more new male characters. I love pretty and cute and OP anime girls as much as the next person, but I need more cool and strong anime-man-units, too.

TL;DR: 
Play. God, thank you for leading this poor soul to Another Eden in this barren desert called quarantine.
Really reminds me of old school rpgs. The fact stamina doesn‚Äôt impede playability and how the world is set up gives me joy.

This game stand heads and shoulders over every other mobile role playing game In so many aspects. The only issue is each update requires a full reinstall and there is always a risk of a ‚Äúdata error‚Äù during install which can take a while to fix. Would be a five star without this issue. Worth the clunky installation/download errors but still a pain to have to deal with on occasion.

I play this game daily!
I love all the side quests and character quests. Keeps me busy for hours. Never run out of things to do. I‚Äôm very picky when it comes to RPGs so when downloading this I was worried it was going to be a cheesy game but wow you guys surprised me! 

It‚Äôs been months since i wrote this review and i still feel the same. love this game so much.

WFs if you read this.  Some of us ima group would like to see the implementation of saved load outs for groups. This way when we switch to a group we can label it and save the equipment on those characters to the group. This way we don‚Äôt forget to equip the party it‚Äôs already done and set as we switch.  Just an idea.  Thanks for listening

content.label:
could you make the intro even more slower? i mean its only like 1 unskippable screen every 3 seconds now...i am sure there are morons in your dev team who cannot keep up at this reading speed....

Been playing for about a month now and awesome game but getting invalid save data when trying to start game. I really love this game and set back to 5 stars after issue is resolved to invested in game for data lost.

The gatcha pull rate is terrible, the main characters you get honestly are subpar. So pulling 5* to build a decent team is pretty much necessary. Also, it would be great if this app actually worked. Brand new iPhone, completely up to date, and out of the blue the app won‚Äôt open anymore even though the app is also completely updated and I can‚Äôt figure out how to get any support for this issue. So that‚Äôs cool.

The only thing in-app purchases earn you is slightly stronger units at a slightly expedited pace. 

What this game offers: 

Riveting single-player experience, with hundreds (and hundreds) of hours of finely crafted stories and encounters.

Superbly scored game, heart-breaking side stories, and layers and layers of strategic gameplay both simple and exceptionally deep (through team composition and unit skill choices).

No limited events, plus the game gives you scores of free endgame units that only require skill (and time) to grab.

Furthermore, the game now lets you level up your favorite units to max level in almost no time at all, while continuing to offer extremely high challenges for players who want to be challenged.

Finally, an amazing community of gamers who are constantly in awe with each new patch, as the game continues to only get better and more innovative.

Best mobile RPG of this generation, hands-down.

I have had fun playing the game. Good story, good character variety and I was progressing just fine as a casual free to play. Unfortunately the game has been broken and unplayable since an update a couple of weeks ago. I haven‚Äôt spent any money on the game, so for me it‚Äôs not a huge deal. But the fact that the developers would allow this to happen for so long should give you caution if you are planning to spend real money on the game.

Updating my review: The developer has resolved the issues with the game occasionally not starting after updates. I started playing it again and was hooked. Great story, loads of content and definitely not pay to win.

title.label: Amazing game, try it if you like RPGs

content.label:
This is an F2P game that is actually F2P friendly. You don‚Äôt need to pay anything to experience all the quests, storylines, and updates. You‚Äôre NOT bombarded with various paywalls all over the place like many other games. 

If I had to nitpick, some of the dialogues are weird at times, and you can tell some sentences are lost in translation. But majority of the plot is phenomenal. 

If you need help with the game, go to reddit. Very nice community that can answer your questions.
It‚Äôs my first time playing a game with such a long story and I‚Äôm loving it. The characters are all interesting and the story is very good.
I enjoy this game soo much! I never thought I would be be playing for hours. I love the story line it make me was to play it to the end.
Very good
I‚Äôve been playing this for an entire day and am completely enthralled. No paywalls and am amazing art direction

This is a great game, also there are cat companions. You don‚Äôt get bombarded by advertisements and it has beautiful graphics. The artists and programers really made a work of art. I have really enjoyed playing. The story seems to be very long and there are mini character stories too! I anticipate playing Eden for a long time. I wonder if it ends? Thanks for such a wonderful game.

This game is actually good. It is gotcha game in the one side and rpg classic.   There is no pay to win. Just awesome character packs and cool wifus. Best part there are free characters and dlc characters. You don‚Äôt need the dlc characters to enjoy the game. But if like to collect all the hero‚Äôs are awesome in some way. A con for me is I would of like a more arc the lad or chrono trigger look.  It worth a download if your look for classic rpg that spans many different zones and long hours game play.
It will be way more better if the updates is synchronized to Japanese Verison.

In chapter 52 
The Specter palace key won‚Äôt open the door in miracle water room. I have clicked the button for many times and nothing happened.
Great little game. A very obvious spiritual Chrono successor. I never spend money on any of these and I still dig it.

I have never been so impressed with an app as this one. Recently, I had a little problem with the game. So, I sent in a notice of the error which happened. My experience in other places has been negative, so I was not expecting anything. Yet today, when I opened up my app, there was a compensation for the error. Whoever is in charge of this app, you are a wonderful person, and I love you!
